page.title: 08Callington Parish Church
page.content: Callington Parish Church is called {St. Marys.}It is situated in the centre of Callington. It has a{tall {tower}with a flag-pole on top, there are{four clock faces}and there are stained glass windows all around. The church is dedicated to Mary {(The blessed virgin).}The church was built shortly before 1438. The church is built in stone. The bells ring every Sunday morning, for the time and for special occasions like{weddings}and {christenings.}Inside the church there are lots of ornaments. Above the{Altar {there are three golden angels.}There are four entrances to the church. Red Carpets are spread up the{isles.}There is a small room at the back of the church for changing into various {vestements.}A quaint winding stair case goes up to the{bells.}
